attributes.action: Either call for the resignation of Quentin Davies or dismiss him as a defense minister for claiming £12,000 expenses from taxpayers on his second home at a time when soldiers had to pay for their own body armour with their own money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Quentin Davies was a hopeless Tory MP before he crossed the floor of the House and has proved to be no better on the Labour benches. Until he is either sacked or resigns, I will never again vote for a labour government
